NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Careful! You know not what lurks in that vile hut.

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Sir please, my friend, he is missing!

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: I fear he my be lost, and you must not be lost too.

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Begone child!

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: This is not your place. I will deal with this.

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: But...

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Do you not know who I am?

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: What I can do?

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Now leave before I give into my temper!

NAME: DIALOGUE_4
MESSAGE: Leave!!

NAME: BEGINNING
MESSAGE: Hello, Welcome to our beautiful town!

NAME: BEGINNING
MESSAGE: Good morning. Let me introduce myself. I am the leader of the town.

NAME: BEGINNING
MESSAGE: My name is

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Hey Ma Ling, could you help an old man?

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Sure, what kind of help do you need?

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: My hoe broke but I need to plow this field to grow rice and sell the harvest to the market.

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Sorry to hear that.
OPTION_1: I will help anyway I can.

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for your help.

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Well, good bye.

NAME: WU_HAI_2
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for your help.

NAME: WU_HAI_3
MESSAGE: Wu Hai! I can help you with your hoe now!

NAME: WU_HAI_4
MESSAGE: Thank you Ma Ling! Now I can finally plow the field!

NAME: WU_HAI_5
MESSAGE: Go to the south east part of the town. You will see a pond there, you may be able to find something to help you.

NAME: GRANDPA_1
MESSAGE: Hey Grandpa Wang, what are you doing?

NAME: GRANDPA_1
MESSAGE: I am trying to catch fish for dinner tonight. However, it is proving difficult ever since my fishing net broke.

NAME: GRANDPA_1
MESSAGE: That's no good!
OPTION_1: I will help you catch a fish.

NAME: GRANDPA_1
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for your help.

NAME: GRANDPA_1
MESSAGE: Well, good bye.

NAME: GRANDPA_2
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for your help.

NAME: GRANDPA_3
MESSAGE: Grandpa Wang! I found a way to fix your net!

NAME: GRANDPA_4
MESSAGE: Thank you Ma Ling! I can finally catch some fish for dinner now!

NAME: GRANDPA_5
MESSAGE: I heard that if you go to the south east side of the town, you may be able to find something to help you.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: Ah Yu whats wrong? Why are you crying?

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: I accidentally ripped my favourite dress when I was trying to buy some apples.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: You poor girl!
OPTION_1: I'll help you fix that tear in your favourite dress. Don't cry!
OPTION_2: Sorry Ah Yu, I can't help you.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for fixing my favourite dress!

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: Okay, maybe my grandma will help me fix my favourite dress.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: Your welcome Ah Yu.

NAME: AH_YU_2
MESSAGE: Thank-you Ma Ling for fixing my favourite dress!

NAME: AH_YU_3
MESSAGE: Ah Yu, I can fix the dress for you now.

NAME: AH_YU_4
MESSAGE: Thank you Ma Ling! It looks as good as new!

NAME: AH_YU_5
MESSAGE: If you go to the pond at the south east part of the town, there may be something to help you.

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: Ma Ling, I see that you are a kind person who is trying to help people.

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: Who are you? How are you speaking to me?

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: That does not matter right now. Take this brush, it is my gift to you.

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: How can I help poeple with a simple painting brush?

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: Go back and help those who you could not help before.

NAME: CLOUD_1
MESSAGE: Ahh, but it is no ordinary paint brush! You shall see its true purpose soon enough.
